title: Vertex Schema for GOV.UK
description: GOV.UK content object representation as stored in Google Vertex AI Enterprise Search

content_id.description: Unique content ID from the Publishing API (for debugging/retrieving single objects)

title.description: The main title (shown in search results)

description.description: A short description (shown in search results)

additional_searchable_text.description: Additional textual content such as keywords that should be searchable but don't form part of the main body of content

link.description: URI reference either as a relative path for GOV.UK content, or as an absolute URL for external content (used to link to the content from search results)

url.description: Absolute URL including protocol and host even for content on GOV.UK proper (used for Vertex to incorporate popularity/event signals)

public_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when this object was last updated (for sorting/filtering/boosting)

part_of_taxonomy_tree.description: A list of GOV.UK taxon IDs that this content object is tagged to (for filtering)

is_historic.description: Whether the content is historic (for boosting; boosts don't support boolean)

organisation_state.description: The state of the organisation (for boosting)

locale.description: The locale of the content (not used yet, may be useful for i18n later)

parts.description: A list of parts (shown below search result if present)
